activities: McKesson transfers human resource personal information about its EU workers to the U.S. for purposes of human resource administration, including recruitment, compensation administration, performance management, training and participation in benefits programs.  Sensitive Information, as defined in the Safe Harbor Framework, may be transferred to the U.S. to the extent necessary to carry out McKesson’s obligations in the field of employment law or as required by law.
corpofftitle1: Executive V.P., General Counsel & Chief Compliance Officer
eucountries: France, Ireland, Luxembourg, Netherlands, United Kingdom
recoursemech: McKesson has agreed to participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the panel established by the European data protection authorities (EU DPAs) to resolve disputes pursuant to the Safe Harbor Principles.
